DOC.brief_summary: This prospective parallel group design group-based Mentalization-Based Therapy Adolescents ( MBT-A ) pilot randomise control trial compare group-based MBT-A plus treatment usual ( TAU ) TAU alone . As pilot study , aim determine : effectiveness recruitment strategy ; compliance protocol/procedures ; trend towards reduce self-harm .
